content: --ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} younger, junior, born afterwards; <ls>Śi. 14. 74.</ls> {2} of a low birth, inferior. (--जः {1} a younger brother; <ls>R. 11. 54</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 11</ls>, <ls n="R. 14.">36.</ls> {2} a Śūdra. (--जा a younger sister; विदर्भराजावरजा <ls>R. 6. 58</ls>, <ls n="R. 6.">84</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 32.</ls>
